sentence: The 2021 America First Political Action Conference was addressed by Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ).

sentence: Last year, U.S. Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Prescott, was the first sitting congressman to ever speak at the conference.

title: Wendy Rogers, Kari Lake and Joe Arpaio listed as speakers at white nationalist conference

sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar sought to distance himself from Nick Fuentes in remarks Friday, saying he didn't intend to make a videotaped greeting for the white nationalist's annual conference in February, though he appeared in person at the gathering last year.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: 'Nick's got a problem with his mouth': Rep. Paul Gosar seeks distance from white nationalist
